alert.note: Alert for Cheboygan; Montmorency; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 2:51AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cheboygan, Presque Isle and northern Montmorency Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 250 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Allis Township, or 10 miles south of Onaway, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Allis Township, Tomahawk Creek Flooding and Tower around 255 AM EDT. Onaway around 300 AM EDT. Millersburg around 305 AM EDT. Ocqueoc and Bisma Township around 310 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Metz, Hawks, Rogers City and Hagensville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
